root.name: Go Go Ackman 2
root.description: OVERVIEWThe second installment in the Go Go Ackman series, Ackman is now pitted against the Metal Angels, a band of Angels inspired by the voice of God, Metatron.Ackman is capable of a wide variety of actions, which often vary depending on the weapon being wielded at the time.CHARACTERSAckmanThe titular character, an obnoxious devil child who collects souls for the Lord of Demons.GordonAckman's partner in crime, a little devil familiar who carries the soul jar. He picks up the souls of destroyed enemies for the player over the course of the game.
